Package com.ibm.util.merge.template.directive

Directives that implement the logic of the merge process.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDataDirective
    Abstract Directive that provides a set of "Data Source" attributes
    AbstractDirective
    Base Directive class
    Enrich
    Responsible for fetching data with a Provider and placing the output in the Data Store
    Insert
    Insert Sub-Templates at Bookmarks based on data in the Data Store
    ParseData
    Parse some encoded data from the Data Store and palce the result back in the Data Store
    Replace
    Build a stack of replace from/to values from the Data Store and optionally process that over the content of the template
    SaveFile
    Save the output of this template to an entry in the merge Archive file

Package com.ibm.util.merge.template.directive Description

Directives that implement the logic of the merge process.
Author:
Mike Storey
